StatDef.label: morph resistance
StatDef.description: Affects the character's ability to retain their current form. Low values will make it easier to change into other forms.

StatDef.label: morph stress
StatDef.description: The more morph stress a character's accumulates the more likely is is that they will morph away from their current form.

StatDef.label: defiance
StatDef.description: How well the character is resisting the mental and physical effects of chimeric influence.

StatDef.label: chimeric distortion
StatDef.description: The more chimeric distortion a character has the harder it will be for them to resist chimeric influence.
